# Amplify_Interview_Test
## UK Road Safety Data_Interview Test

### Instructions
We are delighted to invite you to the next phase of our interview process. You will find a link to UK Road Safety Data below. Please use the data below to showcase the following skills:  

-  ETL Process  
-  Data Visualizations 
-  Data Modeling 
-  Time Management

[Link to dataset -](https://interviewfiles.blob.core.windows.net/ukroadsafetydata/UKRoadSafetyData.zip)

Ultimately the goal is to show us something interesting via a dashboard/report using your favorite tools in an approximately 20-minute presentation. There is no traditional “right answer”, we are looking for how you work with data and communicate insights.  

Let me know if you have any questions!
